events.name: onAction
events.description: Handler that is called when the dropdown item is selected. (**Deprecated**) pass to `DropdownMenu` instead.
events.description_zh: 选择下拉项时调用的处理程序。（**已弃用**）改为传递给“DropdownMenu”。

events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the dropdown item should close after selecting. (**Deprecated**) pass to `DropdownMenu` instead.
events.description_zh: 当下拉项在选择后关闭时调用的处理程序。（**已弃用**）改为传递给“DropdownMenu”。

events.name: onPress
events.description: Handler called when the press is released over the target.
events.description_zh: 当压力机释放到目标上方时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressStart
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction starts.
events.description_zh: 在新闻交互开始时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressEnd
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction ends, either over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.
events.description_zh: 当按下交互结束时（在目标上方或指针离开目标时）调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressChange
events.description: Handler called when the press state changes.
events.description_zh: 当按下状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressUp
events.description: Handler called when a press is released over the target, regardless of whether it started on the target or not.
events.description_zh: 当按下在目标上释放时调用的处理程序，无论它是否在目标上启动。

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Handler called when a key is pressed.
events.description_zh: 按下某个键时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyUp
events.description: Handler called when a key is released.
events.description_zh: 释放密钥时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onClick
events.description: The native button click event handler (**Deprecated**) use **onPress** instead.
events.description_zh: 本机按钮单击事件处理程序 （**已弃用**） 改用 **onPress**。

:children.description: The contents of the dropdown item.

key.description: The unique key for the dropdown item.

title.description: The title of the dropdown item.

textValue.description: A string representation of the item's contents, used for features like typeahead.
textValue.description_zh: 项目内容的字符串表示形式，用于预输入等功能。

description.description: The description of the dropdown item.

:startContent.description: The start content of the dropdown item.

:endContent.description: The end content of the dropdown item. This is positioned after the shortcut and the selected icon.
:endContent.description_zh: 下拉项的结束内容。它位于快捷方式和所选图标之后。

:selectedIcon.description: Custom icon to render when the item is selected.
:selectedIcon.description_zh: 选择项目时要呈现的自定义图标。

showDivider.description: Whether to show a divider below the item.
showDivider.description_zh: 是否在项目下方显示分隔线。

isDisabled.description: Whether the dropdown item should be disabled. (**Deprecated**) pass **disabledKeys** to `DropdownMenu` instead.
isDisabled.description_zh: 是否应禁用下拉项。（**已弃用**） 改为将 **disabledKeys** 传递给“DropdownMenu”。

isSelected.description: Whether the dropdown item should be selected. (**Deprecated**) pass **selectedKeys** to `DropdownMenu` instead.
isSelected.description_zh: 是否应选择下拉列表。（**已弃用**） 改为将 **selectedKeys** 传递给“DropdownMenu”。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the dropdown item press events should be ignored.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 是否应忽略下拉项按下事件。

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the dropdown menu should be closed when the item is selected.
closeOnSelect.description_zh: 选择项目时是否应关闭下拉菜单。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为下拉项槽设置自定义类名。
